question: Which country organized the ‘No Money For Terror’ Ministerial Conference-2019?
explanation: \'\'No Money For Terror-2019\'\' conference was inaugurated in Melbourne, Australia. India will host the next edition of the \'No Money For Terror\' conference to be held in 2020.India called for a united global effort against all those who support terror or help generate finances for terrorism. The \'No Money For Terror\' conference is organized by Financial Intelligence Units (FIUs) of over 100 countries, jointly called The Egmont Group.
